body: @Trophies123 It's worse, she's the one to encourage him to the Netorase just so she could cruely break up with him and humilate him! Her dialogue comes down to making fun of him and calling him gross with a smile as the Sempai straight up tells him he was stupid to assume a NTR partner could be found in a day! The end is her being told to tell him last words which is her at first CLAIMING it's part of the play, before calling him gross again with a smile and leaving to fuck Sempai at his house! It's a guess as he boasted stealing her when she fell for the classic tricked into sex as 'teach her how to be a better fuck partner" and he even filmed and passed it around to his friends that he dumped her when she got pregnant and she dropped out quietly (likely out of shame, didn't even TRY  to baby trap him, so my guess is she was too far in and didn't think to try as she was on cloud 9 till she was tossed away! So really Sempai is the only winner here!)
Love the depiction of used condoms draped all over. It's always been a charm point for me.

@TrendBreaker Nah, in this she was already having sex with the senpai before MC mentioned NTR. At the end she says she was never interested in the MC and only cares about the senpai and never contacts MC again, she gets pregnant to the senpai and drops out of uni.

Lemme guess:  MC is the one who suggest FMC to try swinging or netorase in order to spice up their current sex life.  MC realizes that he made a grave mistake, but it's already too late as the experience will make it so she will never be satisfied with the MC ever again.  But she still says she still "Loves" ( depends on the MC to deal with her drama baggage and to support her financially and emotionally while she has fun ) MC in the end.  Sounds about right, yeah?
this feels a lot like ishimura's art for some reason
